Key Match Events: Nathan Eovaldi pitched six gritty innings
Mitch Garver broke a scoreless tie with an RBI single in the seventh
Josh Jung and Nathaniel Lowe singled off Paul Sewald to start the ninth
Jonah Heim’s single scored two runs
Semien’s two-run homer in the ninth made it 5-0
Post-Match Reflections: Corey Seager earned the World Series MVP award
Bruce Bochy won his fourth World Series title 13 years to the day after his first
The Rangers became the first team to win a World Series game despite having no hits or runs through six innings
It’s the first title for the Rangers, whose history dates back to 1961
The Rangers won 11 road games in a single postseason
Marte went 0 for 2, ending his postseason-record hitting streak at 20 games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Texas Rangers won the first World Series championship in their 63-season franchise history
This was the first title for the Rangers
The Rangers became the first team to win the World Series without committing an error since the 1966 Baltimore Orioles
The Rangers won 13 postseason games after baseball expanded its playoffs to 12 teams in 2022
The Rangers became the first club in any of the four major professional sports in North America to win 11 road games in a single postseason
